page.title: 03Two Bridges - General
page.content:
{Local Facts}
There are four farms in the area at Beardown, Powder Mills, Smith Hill and Spaders Farm. All are off of the road except for Spaders Farm.
The Two Bridges Hotel provides AA 2-star service. Accomodation is also available at the smaller Cherrybrook Hotel.
The area is crossed by the West Dart River and the Cherry Brook, and reaches a high point at Beardown Tors at just over 500 metres above sea level.
The area is littered with ancient hut circles, cists and cairns (old burial chambers).
